segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, letting the water overflow like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she see the puddle growing around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're going to hurt themselves climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to march over there and turn off the faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in a trance, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting really annoyed just watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to do something before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand by and watch this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm going to say something, even if it's not my place.
segments.speaker: PAR
